item.description:
If you know how to get to AMC's Cardigan Lodge Parking Lot we can meet there at 9 AM.Cardigan Lodge is hard to find.Take I93 north to exit 23,go down the exit ramp and make a left onto NH104 west to Bristol.At the traffic light in town make a right into the parking lot for the N.H. Liquor Store.We will meet there at 8:30 AM and caravan to Cardigan Lodge. We will hike the Holt and Clark Trails to the summit of Mt. Cardigan (3,155'). Above treeline hiking on Cardigan, views in all directions. 5.4 miles round trip, 1,850' elevation gain, AMC book time 3.5 hours, 5 hours estimated time for our group. ---Steve & Cindy---

of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold
harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this
group from any and all claims for property damage, injury,
illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by
negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Black Colorado pick up truck NH2431202
item.name: MODERATE HIKE-MOUNT CARDIGAN
